sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const Misson_vision = () => { return (

  • Misson and Vision

1. To impart quality education to the poor, downtrodden massess and to the last man of the Society.

2. To provide facilities for the acquisition of knowledge and information and the advancement of culture.

3. To undertake and make available facilities for reserach in Science.

4. To carry on experiments with a view to improve methods of teaching.

5. To ensure and inculcate perfect discipline in terms of regularity, sincerity and punctuality amongst the students so that they contribute to the society and nation as a whole as most responsible and respectable citizens.

6. To encourage at over all physical and cultural development of students fraternity through various extra curricular activities.

7. To encourage women education by admittin them to various subjects and faculties.

8. To help, assist any institution by advice, guidance and supervision.

9. To organize exhibitions and cultural weeks etc., to inculcate and aequaint students with cultural heritage.

10. To provide a platform to the students by giving them an opportunity to face all the challanges of the competitive worlds, with utmost utilization of their potential in sports, athletic, cultural and other events.

11. To organize and run tournaments, competitions, cultural festivals etc.

12. To undertake publicity and propaganda of the ideal throughts and teaching of our historic personalities by all possible means, such as lectures, debates, and demonstration.

13. To hold, organize, arrange seminars, conferences, kavi sammelan. (Poetic meet)

); }; export default Misson_vision;
